name: Memory Melee
description:
Memory Melee

Turn over cards by clicking with your mouse.  

Assignment: create a memory-match game with some sort of player pressure; I elected to script a simple AI that remembers what cards have been turned on the board and picks accordingly.  The player can wipe out the enemy AI's memory bank by missing enough guesses, giving less astute players a hand up in their battle against the CPU.

GAM 606, MFA in Game Development at the Academy of Art University.   
Sprite card flip code via GunnarKarlsson. UNO card sprites via mehrasaur. 

Further information available at onewinter.net.
